Places to Vist.title: Mount Vernon
Places to Vist.description: Home of George Washington, located in the Mount Vernon area of Alexandria. This spot is really popular to learn more about the history about the first president of the United States
Places to Vist.address: 3200 Mount Vernon Memorial Hwy, Mt Vernon, VA 22121

Places to Vist.title: George Mason University
Places to Vist.description: Visit the most diverse public university in Virginia. At GMU, we are a R1 Research Institution with high levels of research. Offers a lot of programs that give students the most flexibility

Places to Vist.title: Founders Park
Places to Vist.description: Vist Founders Park. It's in Alexandria, Virginia in the Old Town Area. Here, you can be next to the Potomac River, and enjoy a nice view of Maryland and DC. Also, it's peacefull.

Places to Vist.title: Lake Accotink
Places to Vist.description: Vist this place located in Springfield, Virgina. Over here, you will see a stunning lake, and a stunning view. Come here for a peacefull walk with the breeze.
